entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY THIS AFTERNOON
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE WITH DAMAGING WINDS, LARGE HAIL, AND TORNADOES
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING CLEAR
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE WITH DAMAGING WINDS, LARGE HAIL, AND TORNADOES
LOWS AROUND 60
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH, BECOMING WEST 5 TO 10 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS AROUND 80
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

THUNDERSTORMS, SHOWERS
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE WITH DAMAGING WINDS, LARGE HAIL, AND TORNADOES
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE WITH DAMAGING WINDS, LARGE HAIL, AND TORNADOES
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 50
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
